description.en: The O2O ecosystem aims to optimize the exchange, payment, point accumulation and gift-receiving in many forms that are globally linked to the O2O platform. This platform operates on the model of developing applications that provide essential services such as: an application to hire a driver to drive for you – ‘Tika Tika’, an e-commerce application that specializes in selling Korean products – ‘ SeeSee’ and the time-sharing app that connects people – ‘CanU’. - O2OX (https://o2omap.net/) is a token of the platform, which can be used as a payment for the use of platform services, as well as a means of exchange, purchase, and sale of mileage & points.
